sentence: Brian Kemp, and Senate hopeful Herschel Walker.
title: Midterm environment looks more like 2010 than 2018 in NBC News poll

sentence: Georgia Senate: Two super PACs backing GOP Senate candidates Gary Black and Latham Saddler are planning seven-figure ad buys attacking Republican frontrunner Herschel Walker ahead of the May 24 primary, in an attempt to force Walker into a primary runoff, Politico reports.
title: For all of Bidens troubles, hes still more popular than Trump in the NBC News poll
